TopicTitle: (Nevermind!) Is Squadcast and KSPTV the same thing?

Articles.Content:
So yeah...dumb question, but is Twitch streaming just referred to as squadcast or are there actual episodes and if so how do I see what time/when the play?

Edited October 3, 2014 by Friend Bear

Oh I see it, nevermind.

It's in there, but because of the time zone difference it appears on a different day.
